data.name: Luke Cage
data.description: An extremely tough taunting protector with high damage and health.

starItems.name: Luke Cage
starItems.description: An extremely tough taunting protector with high damage and health.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target 
If ally who gained <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to that ally

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage.

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage.

1.nextUpgrade:
Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> 
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. 
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.

3.description: Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self. Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self. 
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. 
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. 
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade: Clear all negative effects from self

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. Clear all negative effects from self. 
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies. 
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies. 
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade: Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for random ally

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies. 
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for random ally.
3.nextUpgrade: Always apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random ally.
4.nextUpgrade: Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for random allies

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for random allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self, <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self, all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all additional allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for random allies.
6.nextUpgrade: Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy for random allies

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self, all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, and <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all additional allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy for random allies.

1.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>80%</color>.
 > On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> when a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>60%</color> Health.
 > At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
 > On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health

2.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match.  > On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> when a <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>60%</color> Health.
 > At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
 > On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>

3.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match.
